channel.title: ~~~Login Help for my Bro~~~
channel.description: My brother wants to play my server from his laptop. The thing is it doesn't let him log on. We tried The server IP (not telling actual IP for advertising reasons), 127.0.0.1, and localhost. The source that I use is not anti-null or 1 IP per connection. How do I fix it so my brother can play?

item.title: ~~~Login Help for my Bro~~~
item.dc:creator: @Doggie_Skill Doggie Skill
item.description:
@Doggie_Skill wrote:

kronixz:

If u both got the same ip them just make the ip 0.0.0.0

Thanks, I’ll try it

But the thing is, for some reason he can’t download clients either. He gets some java panel thing. We tried updating, didn’t work either.

He has Winrar and JDK.

Read full topic

item.title: ~~~Login Help for my Bro~~~
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

If u both got the same ip them just make the ip 0.0.0.0
